verses.name: Psalms 93:1
verses.text: The Lord reigneth, he is clothed with majesty; the Lord is clothed with strength, wherewith he hath girded himself: the world also is stablished, that it cannot be moved.

verses.name: Psalms 93:2
verses.text: Thy throne is established of old: thou art from everlasting.

verses.name: Psalms 93:3
verses.text: The floods have lifted up, O Lord, the floods have lifted up their voice; the floods lift up their waves.

verses.name: Psalms 93:4
verses.text: The Lord on high is mightier than the noise of many waters, yea, than the mighty waves of the sea.

verses.name: Psalms 93:5
verses.text: Thy testimonies are very sure: holiness becometh thine house, O Lord, for ever.
